places_with_reviews.name: Sewak Sweets
address: Near Raghunath Mandir Main Chowk, Baramulla, 193101

reviews.text: One of the best sweet shop in baramulla. Fast food is also delicious. Dosa , noodles , chola poori everything is just yumm and also economical. Staff is very humble and soft spoken. One of my favorite stop in baramulla fo sweets and fast food. 😍 If you are in baramulla do visit here. You will love it  ❤️
SEWAK SWEETS BARAMULLA  is really a good choice for all kinds of Sweets & other confectionery items with reasonable rates and provides a very good n quick service
